Package com.dooapp.gaedo.properties

Interface Summary
Property A property is our vision of what a bean attribute is.
PropertyProvider Class providing properties using various query mechanisms from an input class
 

Class Summary
AbstractPropertyAdapter Base class for random properties implementations.
BeanBackedPropertyProvider  
CachingPropertyProvider Facade for property provider providing a caching feature (hope this will accelerate code)
ClassCollectionProperty  
ComparePropertyByNameAndDeclaringClass Compare properties based upon fields they all declare.
DescribedProperty Property obtained when using beans.
FieldBackedPropertyProvider  
PropertyField Property implemented as a raw field
PropertyProviderUtils Some utility methods
TypeProperty  
 

Exception Summary
NoAllClassesOfException  
NotABeanException Thrown when trying to build a bean property from a non-bean object
PropertyProviderException Base exception class for property providers.
UnableToGetPropertyException Sent when the get method do not works
UnableToSetPropertyException Sent when set operation fails
